name: Bloop.fi
description: Bloop.fi is a DeFi platform built to give pump.fun tokens real, lasting utility beyond speculation. It introduces staking pools, farming, governance, and reward systems that help token communities grow sustainably. By enabling developers to create custom staking pools, offer multi-token rewards, and use buyback systems, Bloop.fi adds transparency, trust, and long-term value. With upcoming GameFi tools, it aims to power the next generation of utility-driven projects on Solana.
